ocr_text:
Do you like BTS? Blackpink? Seventeen? Stray kids? Twice? These are the k-pop groups that is famous globally. While many people is starting to enjoy and love k-pop song and stars, I disagree that k-pop stars have positive influence on Korea's youth. I have several reasons for this.

To begin, some k-pop stars song has bad words in lyric. When I was younger, I've listened to 'All night'. It was song from my favorite k-pop star. I got excited to listen to it. However, it had a lot of bad words in the lyric. This made me feel uncomfortable and made some of my friends to just sing the lyric with the bad words. From then, I didn't listened the song and I still remember the lyric.

Secondly, k-pop stars often wear clothes that is inappropriate for youth to see. k-pop stars often wear clothes that shows their body too much or has weird items on it. I've felt this many times. When I was watching videos of k-pop stars dancing on the stage, I realized that k-pop
